jam.data.func
Class LinearFunction

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.data.CalibrationFunction

        +--jam.data.func.LinearFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function
public class LinearFunction
extends CalibrationFunction

A polynomial function that can be use to calibrate a histogram. Most often used to define energy calibrations of spectra.

Fields inherited from class jam.data.CalibrationFunction
coeff, labels, MAX_NUMBER_TERMS, numberTerms, title

Method Detail

setCoeff

public void setCoeff(double[] aIn)
              throws DataException
Set the coefficients of the calibration function using the contents of the passed Array. If passed a larger than necessary array, the first elements of the array will be used.
Overrides:
setCoeff in class CalibrationFunction
Parameters:
aIn - array of coefficients which should be at least as large as the number of coefficients
